traits.name: Natural Selection
traits.description: Always attacks foe with least HP.

traits.name: Huge Strength
traits.description: Attacks pass through the first row

traits.name: Fencing drill
traits.description: Block one attack and strike back with a counter

traits.name: Martyr
traits.description: If a friendly neighbour is in trouble, this unit jumps in to save them.

traits.name: Lightning strike
traits.description: Call down lightning bolts upon your enemy.

traits.name: Blast
traits.description: Strike at your enemy and its neighbours.

traits.name: Strike
traits.description: Strike the enemy with your weapon.

traits.name: DummyTrait
traits.description: Dummytext for a dummytrait. Lets just add some more words to it.
